title: Brand New 3BR Prime Residencies Edmonton - Colombo 5 - Move in ready June 2018!
details:
A brand new apartment at Prime Residencies Edmonton. A modern residential complex located in a convenient and highly residential neighbourhood of Colombo 5. The apartment will be ready for occupancy in September 2018!

The apartment features- 3 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, rooftop swimming pool, garden and gymnasium.

This u it is listed Rs.3Million cheaper than the developer’s price!!!!

Please call for further information regarding this listing.
